cpl.readme: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for Javascript tiddlers (application/javascript) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-javascript
cpl.name: CodeMirror Mode JavaScript
title: Plugin_202303171221155
